cast.overview: The extraordinary tale of Harriet Tubman's escape from slavery and transformation into one of America's greatest heroes. Her courage, ingenuity and tenacity freed hundreds of slaves and changed the course of history.
cast.title: Harriet

details.biography: Henry Hunter Hall (born April 5, 1996) is an American actor. He is is the son of filmmaker and actress Kasi Lemmons and actor Vondie Curtis-Hall. He had a cameo role as a child in his father's 1997 film Gridlock'd, starring Tim Roth and Tupac. In 2019, Hall appeared in the miniseries When They See Us.
details.name: Henry Hunter Hall
